scripts.deploy:api:LOCAL: export ENV=LOCAL && yarn samconfig && sam deploy -t cf.household.yaml && yarn postdeploy --profile losonczil
scripts.deploy:api:CI: export ENV=CI && yarn samconfig && sam deploy -t cf.household.yaml && yarn postdeploy --profile ci
scripts.start:account: sam local start-api -t sam.account.yaml -p 3000 -n env.json -l account.log
scripts.start:category: sam local start-api -t sam.category.yaml -p 3001 -n env.json -l category.log
scripts.start:project: sam local start-api -t sam.project.yaml -p 3002 -n env.json -l project.log
scripts.start:recipient: sam local start-api -t sam.recipient.yaml -p 3003 -n env.json -l recipient.log
scripts.start:transaction: sam local start-api -t sam.transaction.yaml -p 3004 -n env.json -l transaction.log
scripts.start:product: sam local start-api -t sam.product.yaml -p 3005 -n env.json -l product.log
scripts.start: concurrently 'yarn start:account' 'yarn start:category' 'yarn start:project' 'yarn start:recipient' 'yarn start:transaction' 'yarn start:product'
scripts.deploy:web:CI: export ENV=CI && aws s3 sync dist/web s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name Household-${ENV} --query "Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='WebsiteBucket'].OutputValue" --output text --profile ci) --profile ci
